import React, { useCallback, useState } from 'react'; import {createUser} from './services/signupService'; function HeaderComponent(){ const [signUpData, setSignUpData] = useState([]); //const [password, setPassword] = useState([]); //const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState([]); const sendRequest = useCallback(() => { let user = document.getElementById("signupusername").value; let pass = document.getElementById("signuppassword").value; let pass2 = document.getElementById("confirmPassword").value; if(pass === pass2){ let pobj = createUser(user, pass); pobj.then((response) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(response.data, null, 3)); setSignUpData(response.data.result) }); pobj.catch((error) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(error, null, 3)) }); document.getElementById("suSuc").style.display = "block"; } else{ console.error("Passwords didn't match"); document.getElementById("suFail").style.display = "block"; } }, []); return (

); } export default HeaderComponent;
